Sans',sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;position:relative;clear:both}#blog-pager:after{content:'';display:block;position:absolute;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;background-color:#242d4a;opacity:.75}.blog-pager-inner{max-width:720px;margin:0 auto;position:relative;z-index:1}#blog-pager a{display:inline-block;padding:20px 5px}.blog-pager #blog-pager-older-link,.blog-pager #blog-pager-newer-link{float:left}.home-link{float:right}#blog-pager a:link{color:#dde9f3}#blog-pager a:visited{color:#dde9f3}#blog-pager a:hover{color:#1cbb8c}#blog-pager .fa{margin:0 6px}#header-inner,.Header>div{width:auto!important;height:auto!important}.sidebar .widget,.footer .widget{font:normal bold normal 14px 'Open Sans',sans-serif;color:#dde9f3;margin:0;padding:30px}.footer .widget{padding:0 25px}.sidebar .widget:after,.footer .widget:not(.Attribution):after{content:'';display:block;margin-top:60px;width:30%;min-width:75px;border-bottom:2px solid #dde9f3;opacity:.5}.footer .widget:not(.Attribution):after{width:10%;min-width:25px;margin-top:25px}#sidr .widget>h2,.Subscribe h2,.footer h2{font:normal bold normal 16px 'Montserrat',sans-serif;color:#dde9f3;padding:0 0 20px}#sidr .widget .widget-content,#google_translate_element,.FeaturedPost .post-summary,.footer .widget-content{font:normal bold normal 14px 'Open Sans',sans-serif}#sidr .PlusOne .widget-content,.footer .PlusOne .widget-content{margin-top:0}#sidr .widget blockquote,.footer .widget blockquote{font-size:16px;padding:25px 25px 25px 60px;background-image:none!important}#sidr .widget blockquote:before,.footer .widget blockquote:before{margin-left:-30px}#sidr .widget li,.footer .widget li{list-style-type:none;padding:5px 0}#sidr .widget a,.footer .widget a{color:#dde9f3}#sidr .widget a:visited,.footer .widget a:visited{color:#dde9f3}#sidr .widget a:hover,.footer .widget a:hover{color:#fff}.PopularPosts ul,.Label ul,.LinkList ul,#sidebar .PageList ul,.Feed ul,.TextList ul,.BlogArchive ul,.PageList ul{padding:0;padding-left:0!important;text-align:left}.FeaturedPost .post-summary h3{margin-bottom:10px}.FeaturedPost .post-summary img{margin-top:10px}.BlogList .blog-list-container .blog-content{float:none;margin:0 0 5px 0}.BlogList .blog-title{margin:2px 5px 10px 20px!important}.BlogList .blog-title a{font-size:16px}.BlogList .item-title{font-size:16px}.BlogList .blog-list-container .item-thumbnail{margin:0 10px 5px 0}.BlogList .item-snippet{font-size:12px}.BlogList .item-time{margin-top:5px;opacity:.75;font-style:normal}.PlusBadge>div{display:block!important;margin-top:15px!important}.NewsBar h2:before{content:'\f1ea'}.NewsBar .statusItem_gsnb{padding:6px 10px;border:solid 1px;border-radius:2px;display:inline-block}.NewsBar .resultsBox_gsnb{margin-top:15px}.NewsBar .gs-newsResult.gs-result{margin-bottom:10px}.gs-result .gs-title,.gs-result .gs-title *,.gs-result .gs-watermark{color:#dde9f3!important}.PageList .selected a{font-weight:600!important;border-bottom:1px dashed}.BlogArchive ul.flat{text-align:right}.BlogArchive ul.flat li a{text-align:left;float:left}.BlogArchive select{display:block;width:100%;padding:5px}.contact-form-widget{padding-top:10px}.ContactForm form{font-weight:400}.contact-form-email,.contact-form-name,.ContactForm textarea{margin-bottom:10px;padding:5px;border:none!important}.contact-form-button{margin-top:5px}.Image .widget-content{position:relative}.Image .widget-content:after{content:'';display:block;clear:both}.Image .widget-content a{float:left}.Image .widget-content img{max-width:100%;width:auto;height:auto;float:left}.Image .caption{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;font:normal bold normal 14px 'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#dde9f3;padding:6px 10px;display:inline-block;background-color:#1d2239}.Label li,.Label .widget-content{text-align:left}.Label li span:first-child{border-bottom:1px dashed}.Label li span:nth-child(2){float:right;text-align:right}#min-flickr a{float:left;line-height:0;width:33.3%;box-sizing:border-box;display:block;padding:2px;opacity:.85}#min-flickr a:hover{opacity:1}#min-flickr img{width:100%!important;height:auto!important;border-radius:2px}.FollowByEmail form{padding:0 3px 0 9px;background:white}.FollowByEmail form input{border:none!important;padding:0 5px}.FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-address{margin:5px 0}.FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-inner tr:before{content:'\f003';display:table-cell;opacity:.5;margin:0 1px 0 0;color:#dde9f3}.FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-inner tr:before,.Profile .profile-name-link:before,.Profile dd.profile-data:before,.post .g-profile:before{font:normal normal normal 16px/1 FontAwesome;text-rendering:auto;transform:translate(0,0)}.Profile .widget-content img{float:left;margin:0 10px 0 0;max-width:100%;width:auto;height:auto;border-radius:3px}.Profile .profile-name-link,.Profile .profile-data{background:none!important;padding-left:0;font:normal bold normal 14px 'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-weight:600;font-size:16px}.Profile .profile-name-link:before{content:'\f007';margin-right:1px}.Profile dd.profile-data:before{content:'\f041';margin-right:5px}.Profile .profile-textblock{font-size:13px;line-height:1.35em;margin-top:5px}.PopularPosts li{margin:0;padding:5px 0!important}.PopularPosts li .item-content{margin-bottom:10px}.PopularPosts li .item-content:after{content:'';display:block;clear:both}.PopularPosts .item-title a{font:normal bold normal 14px 'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-size:16px;font-weight:600;text-decoration:underline}.PopularPosts li>a:hover:after{opacity:1}.PopularPosts li .item-thumbnail-only{margin-bottom:10px}.PopularPosts li .item-thumbnail-only:after{content:'';display:block;clear:both}.PopularPosts div.item-thumbnail{padding:0;margin:0 10px 0 0;position:relative;z-index:1;width:70px;height:70px}.PopularPosts .item-thumbnail img{max-width:100%;width:auto;height:auto;padding:0;border-radius:3px}.PopularPosts .item-snippet{font-size:13px;line-height:1.25em;padding:0 0 0 80px}.PopularPosts li>.item-snippet{margin-bottom:10px}.CustomSearch h2:before{content:'\f002'}.searchform,.gsc-search-box{padding:5px;margin:0;color:black;background:white;position:relative;min-width:100px;box-sizing:border-box;max-width:300px}.searchform:after,.gsc-search-box:after{content:'';display:block;width:100%;clear:both}.searchform .search-input{position:absolute;left:5px;right:45px}.search-input input,.gsc-input input{width:100%}.searchform input{border:none!important;padding:5px;background:0}.searchform .search-button{float:right}.searchform .search-button input{font:normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;font-size:16px;text-rendering:auto;transform:translate(0,0);cursor:pointer}table.gsc-search-box{padding:0;margin-bottom:0!important}input.gsc-input{padding:5px!important;width:100%;border:none!important}input.gsc-search-button{margin:0;margin-left:8px;border:0;border-radius:2px;background-color:rgb(0,0,0,0.6);cursor:pointer;color:#dde9f3;z-index:0;font-size:13px;height:26px}#footer-wrapper{clear:both;margin:0;padding:50px 25px;font:normal bold normal 14px/1.5em 'Open Sans',sans-serif;color:#242d4a;background-color:rgb(0,0,0,0.5)}#footer-wrapper .widget a{text-decoration:none}#footer-wrapper .widget a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.footer-inner{padding:0}#Attribution1{margin:50px auto 0}.mobile h1.title,.mobile h3.post-title{font-size:24px}.mobile .entry-title{font-size:24px}.mobile-post-outer a:hover{text-decoration:none}.mobile .mobile-index-contents .post-body{display:block;color:#dde9f3}.mobile .post-timestamp{margin-left:-1em}.mobile .post-footer-line{margin:5px 0}.mobile .goog-inline-block.dummy-container{margin:10px 0 0;width:60px}#mobile-share-button{padding:2px 0}.mobile .comments .comment-replybox-thread{margin-top:30px;padding:0 24px}.mobile #footer-wrapper{padding:30px}.mobile #Attribution1{margin-top:0}

b:if.script: $(document).ready(function(){if($(".post-body iframe").length>0){$(".post-body iframe").each(function(){var m=new RegExp("youtube"),n=new RegExp("vimeo"),l=new RegExp("dailymotion"),o=new RegExp("metacafe");if(m.test($(this).attr("src"))||n.test($(this).attr("src"))||l.test($(this).attr("src"))||o.test($(this).attr("src"))){$(this).wrap('<div class="video-container">')}m=null;n=null;l=null;o=null})}$(".cover").each(function(){var o=$(this),q=new RegExp(/https|http/),p=new RegExp(/url\("|"\)|url\('|'\)|url\(|\)/gi),m=new RegExp("youtube"),n=o.find(".thumb-url").text();if(q.test(n)){if(m.test(n)){o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("default.jpg","sddefault.jpg")+'")'})}else{o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("s72-c","s"+$("#main-wrapper").width())+'")'})}}})});

$(document).ready(function(){if($(window).width()>800){$(".post-outer:nth-child(3n+1) .cover").each(function(){var o=$(this),q=new RegExp(/https|http/),p=new RegExp(/url\("|"\)|url\('|'\)|url\(|\)/gi),m=new RegExp("youtube"),n=o.find(".thumb-url").text();if(q.test(n)){if(m.test(n)){o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("default.jpg","sddefault.jpg")+'")'})}else{o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("s72-c","s"+$("#main-wrapper").width())+'")'})}}});$(".post-outer:not(:nth-child(3n+1)) .cover").each(function(){var o=$(this),q=new RegExp(/https|http/),p=new RegExp(/url\("|"\)|url\('|'\)|url\(|\)/gi),m=new RegExp("youtube"),n=o.find(".thumb-url").text();if(q.test(n)){if(m.test(n)){o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("default.jpg","sddefault.jpg")+'")'})}else{o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("s72-c","s"+Math.ceil(($("#main-wrapper").width()/2)/100)*100)+'")'})}}})}else{$(".cover").each(function(){var o=$(this),q=new RegExp(/https|http/),p=new RegExp(/url\("|"\)|url\('|'\)|url\(|\)/gi),m=new RegExp("youtube"),n=o.find(".thumb-url").text();if(q.test(n)){if(m.test(n)){o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("default.jpg","sddefault.jpg")+'")'})}else{o.css({"background-image":'url("'+n.replace("s72-c","s"+$("#main-wrapper").width())+'")'})}}})}});
